home__description: Passionate about system operations and network management, with multi-platform deployment experience, skilled at solving practical technical problems, pursuing efficient and stable technical implementations.
about__description: I am YangHE, a technical engineer focused on system operations and network management, with rich multi-platform deployment experience. Skilled at independently building monitoring dashboards, web tool stations, and network service environments. Possessing good troubleshooting and learning abilities, capable of quickly solving problems in practical situations to achieve efficient and stable operational goals.
portfolio1__description: Front-end based image random display site with image hosting, deployed on Koyeb, supporting multiple image carousel.
portfolio2__description: Efficient node built on Lade platform, supporting multiple protocols, running stably for months.
